notes.title: Data availability
notes.p: The output data generated during our analyses and supporting the findings of this paper are available in the IIASA DARE repository with access code 41: [ https://dare.iiasa.ac.at/41/]. This repository also contains R-scripts to regenerate all figures in this paper. The input data used in this analysis are available at the following public locations: NASA-NEX climate data: [ https://cds.nccs.nasa.gov/nex-gddp/]. GDP and population for the Shared Socioeconomic Pathways: [ https://tntcat.iiasa.ac.at/SspDb]. Spatial population projections for the SSPs: [10.7927/H4RF5S0P].
